page.title: 03Houses on the City Outskirts
page.content:
{ Housing}on the eastern outskirts of Hull is both private and council. { Ganstead Lane}has privately-owned {houses}and{bungalows}which vary in price from Â£30,000 to Â£50,000. Few of the{houses}are built in similar styles and fewer built at similar times (some as early as the 1930's). Often the homes are in groups(eg. 3 detached houses). Most have garages and large gardens.
{ Longhill}and{Bilton Grange}are both {council estates}which are 25 years old and were designed around a main road and a shopping area. The{houses}are terraced, arranged with about 40 to a street. There are gardens at both the front and back. All the{houses}are in the same design, but the inhabitants have had the chance to buy their homes resulting in changes to the exterior.
